Comment: A nice game (mostly because of the enterprising play of my opponent) that I finally decided to annotate....
A Nimzowitsch's idea: white has jus played g3 to defende one weakness (the a8-h1 diagonal) but, by doing so, he has created another (the c4 pawn) that black promptly attacks
